title: Reaper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to stalk at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of the night you stalk them, as well as the night after, you will learn who they visited that night.
- After two nights, you will deal a Powerful attack to the players they visited the last two nights.
- If they did not visit, you will deal a Powerful attack to them.
- You are Astral.
- You can only be stalking two players at time.

desc:
Post 5
*It follows. It stalks. It slashes. It loses because it's a ToS-balanced NK.*
